data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Scott, Elizabeth, Visser, John D., Yetman, Caroline A., Oliver, Lauren, Broadley, Donald G. (2013): Revalidation of Pyxicephalus angusticeps Parry, 1982 (Anura: Natatanura: Pyxicephalidae), a bullfrog endemic to the lowlands of eastern Africa. Zootaxa 3599 (3): 201-228, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3599.3.1
